Introduction

This configuration is quite useful for traders who deal with commodities like Soybeans, Rice, Sugar, Wheat, Corn, Cotton Etc. CRM, Sales, purchase, Inventory, Manufacturing, Quality, Accounting Application will be useful to setup Configuration.

Commodity trading business required certain requirements like weighing scale data, specific quality check & parameters check inputs during GRN Activities.

For most of purchases they keep Broker in the loop who is in direct contact with actual vendor. Broker is responsible for quality of products & He Gets commision from trader for assistance on managing processes.

They generally doing business with following flow as explained in detail below.

business Flows

Use Case :1 Direct trading

Purchase Order >> Receipt >> Bill >> Sales Order>> Delivery

Purchase commoditiesfrom Vendors locally or import & store at their different warehouses & after getting orders from their customer they will deliver to them.

1. Create Purchase Order , Select Broker who is work as mediator between Vendor & buyer & responsible for if anything unwanted happens during delivery or in Quality of commodities. confirm Purchase order,

2. In Inventory application in receipt menu select the transfer which needs to receive & select the action 'select for GRN' .

3. In inventory Application inWeighing Scale/GRN Details menu select subsequent transfer to receive material after inputting all details of weight & material.

4. Billing will be done against PO & received material

5. commodities delivery to end customer against Sales order Generation.

Use Case : 2 Dropship material directly to customer

Create Sales Order >> RFQ created based on Vendor defined on product >> confirm Purchase order >> Dropship created.

for some commodities, they purchase only after getting orders from their customer, vendor could dropship or commoditiesship to warehouse first & they deliverto customer at later stage.

1. Create Sales order according to customer's requirements, automatically Request for quotation will be created according to vendor define over product form (or Vendor price list)

2. Based on approval of RFQ , purchase order generated & dropship will be created to deliver material directly to customer.

Use Case :3 Sell after processing Material internally

Purchase different Commodities >> receipt >> Blending Process ( Manufacturing Order ) >> material availability of FG >> Sales order >> Delivery


They purchase the same commodities of different qualities & then do the blending(Mixing) process to make another quality of same commodities & sell them.

1. Purchase Raw materials of commodities & store in Warehouse.

2. Create Manufacturing Order of Finish commodities with Blending (mixing) Process & complete MO to product FG in stock.

3. Create Sales order to sell & deliver the FG commodities.
